Name: chronic lacrimal gland enlargement
Definition: A mucopolysaccharidosis characterized by a deficiency of the lysosomal enzymes galactose 6-sulfate sulfatase (Type A) or beta-galactosidase (Type B) needed to break down the keratan sulfate sugar chain.

Name: obsolete Clostridium difficile intestinal infectious disease
Definition: A commensal bacterial infectious disease that involves infection of the intestine by the bacterium Clostridium difficile
Synonym: intestinal infectious disease due to clostridium difficile

Name: chronic dacryoadenitis

Name: acute dacryoadenitis
Definition: A sinusitis which involves infection of ethmoid sinuses that causes pain or pressure behind and between the eyes
